descriptionHtml:
[banner]

There's so many of us playing elves, worshiping the nine divines against our own wishes. Just to get rid of a disease or attain a few buffs. It's bad enough with all this talk of "Nord tradition" that we can't even worship the Nordic gods.

[description]

This mod currently aims to fix that by adding new shrines for a variety of elven religions as a modder's resource. There is also a mod that distributes these shrines among the game, giving shrines to NPC homes, adding new locations and custom buffs to each shrine. It is completely modular and you can pick and choose which aspects of the mod you would like to see. PLEASE make sure you downloaded the right file before you post a bug report here.

[modules]
[b]EW: Altmeri Temple [/b]- temple in XXXXXX that contains all of the Altmeri shrines and a new Altmer priest follower
[b]EW: Bosmeri Temple [/b]- temple in XXXXXX that contains all of the Bosmeri shrines and a new Bosmer hunter follower
[b]EW: Household Shrines [/b]- this one adds various shrines to suitable NPC homes and locations in game

[also included]
[b]EW:Â Power in Faith [/b]- this is the resource pack which includes all meshes and textures for shrines and amulets for use in other mods

[credits]
Kelretu for supplying various shrine models and textures
Hiphopopotamus5782 for his ideas over on the [url=https://www.reddit.com/r/skyrimmods/comments/3qc1ax/elven_worship/]old reddit page[/url]
author: Komodo and Kelretu
